jobDescription: Airbnb has become a global platform that connects travelers and hosts from over 34,000 cities. The mission for the Product Quality initiatives is to provide a comprehensive view into Airbnb’s online product quality that delivers actionable insights.  We are looking for a Data Scientist passionate about Product Quality and focused on analytics to join our team. Working alongside Engineers, PMs and other Data Scientists and digging deep into Airbnb's data, you will help translate complex findings and results into a compelling narrative. In this role, you will have tremendous upwards exposure as the Data Science team’s mouthpiece to senior business partners. If you’re passionate about leveraging data to drive business and product decisions, we want to hear from you.  Examples of projects you would work on: Measure the business impact of site incidents to help both Infrastructure and Product teams to set prioritiesMonitor system health proactively by creating a set of metrics and leverage techniques such as anomaly detection to identify incidentsDefine key metrics to measure the site performance across web and mobile in different stages of the booking flow.Scope experimentation plans to measure impact of performance improvementsShape the trajectory of the broader organization by deep diving to understand the right product quality metrics to set Some examples of traits we value: Minimum 2 years industry experienceA graduate degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics or related field is highly preferredAbility to write clean and concise code, especially in Python, R and SQLExpert on building data pipelines, and implementing visualizations, dashboards, and reportsExperience in A/B testing and experimentation designNice to have basic knowledge in machine learning modelingStrong communication skills, consulting experience is a plusA “business owner” mindset - someone who will not just bring data to the table but will bring recommendations and own the outcome
